# RSVsim

A deterministic, ODE model of Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV)
transmission. This package is under constant development, so will change
without notice. The current model outputs are yet to be fully tested.

## Installation

You can install the development version of RSVsim from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("IsaacStopard/RSVsim")
```

## Model structure

The model is an adapted version of an
susceptible-exposed-infectious-recovered-susceptible (SEIRS)
deterministic, ordinary differential equation (ODE) model outlined in:

- Hogan, A. B., Campbell, P. T., Blyth, C. C., Lim, F. J., Fathima, P.,
  Davis, S., â€¦ & Glass, K. (2017). Potential impact of a maternal
  vaccine for RSV: a mathematical modelling study. Vaccine, 35(45),
  6172-6179, <https://doi.org/10.1016/j.vaccine.2017.09.043>,

- Nazareno, A. L., Newall, A. T., Muscatello, D. J., Hogan, A. B., &
  Wood, J. G. (2024). Modelling the epidemiological impact of maternal
  respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) vaccination in Australia. Vaccine,
  42(26), 126418, <https://doi.org/10.1016/j.vaccine.2024.126418>.

In brief, the model is age-structured and primary (the first, $p$) and
secondary infections (any subsequent infection, $s$) are specifically
tracked. The force of infection is determined by a seasonal forcing
function ($\beta$) and the age-specific contact matrix (the mean
contacts per person, $M$). The population is stratified into susceptible
($S$), exposed ($E$), infectious ($I$) and recovered states ($R$).

![](reference/figures/ODE_model.png)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`RSVsim`](https://isaacstopard.github.io/RSVsim/reference/RSVsim.md)
  : RSVsim: A package for simulating Respiratory Synctial Virus (RSV)
  transmission.
- [`RSVsim_ABC_SMC()`](https://isaacstopard.github.io/RSVsim/reference/RSVsim_ABC_SMC.md)
  : Function to run an Approximate Bayesian Computation Sequential Monte
  Carlo (ABC-SMC) algorithm
- [`RSVsim_ABC_rejection()`](https://isaacstopard.github.io/RSVsim/reference/RSVsim_ABC_rejection.md)
  : Function to run an Approximate Bayesian Computation (ABC) rejection
  algorithm
- [`RSVsim_abs_dist_fun()`](https://isaacstopard.github.io/RSVsim/reference/RSVsim_abs_dist_fun.md)
  : Distance function to calculate the absolute difference between two
  vectors.
- [`RSVsim_amplitude()`](https://isaacstopard.github.io/RSVsim/reference/RSVsim_amplitude.md)
  : Summary function to calculate the age-specific amplitude of changes
  in incidence over the simulation.
- [`RSVsim_contact_matrix()`](https://isaacstopard.github.io/RSVsim/reference/RSVsim_contact_matrix.md)
  : Create contact matrix for RSVsim
- [`RSVsim_parameters()`](https://isaacstopard.github.io/RSVsim/reference/RSVsim_parameters.md)
  : Get parameters for RSVsim
- [`RSVsim_peak()`](https://isaacstopard.github.io/RSVsim/reference/RSVsim_peak.md)
  : Summary function to calculate the age-specific timing of peak
  incidence.
- [`RSVsim_run_model()`](https://isaacstopard.github.io/RSVsim/reference/RSVsim_run_model.md)
  : Runs the RSV model using odin and dust
- [`RSVsim_shortest_periodic_dist_fun()`](https://isaacstopard.github.io/RSVsim/reference/RSVsim_shortest_periodic_dist_fun.md)
  : Distance function to calculate the shortest periodic difference
  between two vectors.
- [`RSVsim_total_incidence()`](https://isaacstopard.github.io/RSVsim/reference/RSVsim_total_incidence.md)
  : Summary function to calculate the age-specific total incidence over
  the simulation.
- [`RSVsim_update_parameters()`](https://isaacstopard.github.io/RSVsim/reference/RSVsim_update_parameters.md)
  : Helper function to update the parameter list by names
